message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm offering it to you at a price of $1400000, which represents a significant potential upside for you. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
